title: Add top-of-page updates notice and ensure no email address is shown

requirements.text: Add a notice at the very top of the storefront (visible immediately on first load) with the exact text: “Customers will receive updates when the product drops and when their preorder has been shipped.”

quotes:
use:

“Customers will receive updates when the product drops and when their preorder has been shipped.”

I want it place at soon at you open the website

acceptanceCriteria: When the page first loads, the notice is visible without any user interaction and appears above the existing header content.
The notice text matches exactly: “Customers will receive updates when the product drops and when their preorder has been shipped.”
The notice is shown on the main storefront page (the single product page).

requirements.text: Do not display the email address “sincerelykilla@icloud.com” anywhere in the UI (including header, main content, footer, and the Cash App instructions modal). If the email address exists in any frontend user-facing strings, remove it.

quotes: I don’t want it shown at all

acceptanceCriteria: The string “sincerelykilla@icloud.com” does not appear anywhere in the rendered UI.
No new UI elements are added that show an email address.

constraints: Frontend must remain React + TypeScript with Tailwind and existing UI component composition; do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not modify frontend immutable hook/entry files (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Backend remains single-actor Motoko; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Implementing email sending, subscriptions, mailing lists, or any outbound email functionality.
Adding new payment integrations beyond the existing manual Cash App instructions flow.

preferencesToAdd: Do not display the email address on the website.
